info.official_title: A First-in-Human Study to Determine the Safety, Pharmacokinetics and Efficacy of KPG-121 When Administered With Enzalutamide, Abiraterone, or Apalutamide in Subjects With Non-Metastatic or Metastatic Castration-Resistant Prostate Cancer
